verses.verse: In the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> of the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1296>Berechiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5714>Iddo<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H7110>very<s%> <S%H7107>angry<s%> with your fathers.

"Therefore <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H7725>"Return<s%> to Me," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> "that I may <S%H7725>return<s%> to you," <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

"Do not be like your fathers, to <S%H1>whom<s%> the <S%H834>former<s%> <S%H7223>prophets<s%> <S%H5030>proclaimed,<s%> <S%H7121>saying,<s%> <S%H559>'Thus<s%> <S%H3541>says<s%> the <S%H559>Lord<s%> of <S%H3068>hosts,<s%> <S%H6635>"Return<s%> <S%H7725>now<s%> from your <S%H4994>evil<s%> <S%H7451>ways<s%> and from your <S%H1870>evil<s%> <S%H7451>deeds.<s%>"' But they did not <S%H4611>listen<s%> or <S%H8085>give<s%> <S%H7181>heed<s%> to Me," <S%H7181>declares<s%> the <S%H5002>Lord.<s%>
"Your fathers, <S%H1>where<s%> are they? And the <S%H346>prophets,<s%> do they <S%H5030>live<s%> <S%H2421>forever<s%>?

"But did not My <S%H1697>words<s%> and My <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> My <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H5381>overtake<s%> your fathers? Then they <S%H1>repented<s%> and <S%H7725>said,<s%> 'As the <S%H559>Lord<s%> of <S%H3068>hosts<s%> <S%H6635>purposed<s%> to <S%H2161>do<s%> to us in accordance with our <S%H6213>ways<s%> and our <S%H1870>deeds,<s%> <S%H4611>so<s%> He has <S%H3651>dealt<s%> with us.'"' "

On the twenty-fourth <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H7627>Shebat,<s%> in the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1296>Berechiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5714>Iddo,<s%> as follows: <S%H559><s%>

I <S%H7200>saw<s%> at <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> was <S%H7392>riding<s%> on a <S%H122>red<s%> <S%H5483>horse,<s%> and he was <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H1918>myrtle<s%> <S%H1918>trees<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were in the <S%H4699>ravine,<s%> with <S%H122>red,<s%> <S%H8320>sorrel,<s%> and <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> him.

Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> "My <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> are <S%H428>these<s%>?" And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> who was <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with me <S%H559>said<s%> to me, "I will <S%H7200>show<s%> you <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are."

And the <S%H376>man<s%> who was <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H1918>myrtle<s%> <S%H1918>trees<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H428>"These<s%> are those <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H1980>patrol<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

So they <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> who was <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H1918>myrtle<s%> <S%H1918>trees,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "We have <S%H1980>patrolled<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H3427>peaceful<s%> and <S%H8252>quiet.<s%>"

Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H4970>how<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> wilt Thou <S%H7355>have<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7355>compassion<s%> for <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> Thou hast <S%H2194>been<s%> <S%H2194>indignant<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>?"
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> who was <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with me with <S%H2896>gracious<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H5150>comforting<s%> <S%H1697>words.<s%>

So the <S%H4397>angel<s%> who was <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with me <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H7121>"Proclaim,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%>" I am <S%H1419>exceedingly<s%> <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

"But I am <S%H1419>very<s%> <S%H7110><s%> <S%H7107>angry<s%> with the <S%H1471>nations<s%> who are at <S%H7600>ease;<s%> for while I was only a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H7107>angry,<s%> they <S%H5826>furthered<s%> the <S%H9567>disaster.<s%>"

<S%H3651>'Therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "I will <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> with <S%H7356>compassion;<s%> My <S%H1004>house<s%> will be <S%H1129>built<s%> in it," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> "and a <S%H6957>measuring<s%> <S%H6957>line<s%> will be <S%H5186>stretched<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>"'

<S%H5750>"Again,<s%> <S%H7121>proclaim,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> "My <S%H5892>cities<s%> will <S%H5750>again<s%> <S%H9446>overflow<s%> with <S%H9185>prosperity,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5750>again<s%> <S%H5162>comfort<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> and <S%H5750>again<s%> <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> "'"
Then I <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> [there were] <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7161>horns.<s%>

So I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> who was <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with me, <S%H4100>"What<s%> are <S%H428>these<s%>?" And he <S%H559>answered<s%> me, <S%H428>"These<s%> are the <S%H7161>horns<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H2219>scattered<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>"
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>showed<s%> me <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2796>craftsmen.<s%>

And I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> are <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H935>coming<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%>?" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H428>"These<s%> are the <S%H7161>horns<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H2219>scattered<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H6310>so<s%> that <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5375>lifts<s%> up his <S%H7218>head;<s%> but <S%H428>these<s%> [craftsmen] have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H2729>terrify<s%> them, to <S%H3034>throw<s%> <S%H3034>down<s%> the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> who have <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up [their] <S%H7161>horns<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> in order to <S%H2219>scatter<s%> it."
